item.title: Deanne Nixie Miao
item.description: Deanne Nixie Miao graduated with a BSc Honors in Genetics at the University of Manitoba. She completed an undergraduate thesis on characterizing the development of bones in hyaluronidase-2 KO and CON mouse embryos. She is currently a Lab Technician in the Department of Biochemistry and Medical Genetics in Dr. Triggs-Raine’s and Dr. Drögemöller’s lab.
